summary.span: 提供可用于自动管理打印服务器、打印队列和打印作业的类。

span.span: Provides classes that enable you to automate the management of print servers, print queues, and print jobs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间包含以下核心类：This namespace contains the following core classes: - 类，该类是其他核心打印类的基类。The class, which is the base class for the other core printing classes. - 表示实际打印服务器（通常是计算机）的类。The class, which represents an actual print server, usually a computer. - 类，它表示实际打印队列及其打印机。The class, which represents an actual print queue and its printer. - 类，它表示特定的打印作业。The class, which represents a particular print job. - 类，指示打印机如何处理打印作业。The class, which instructs the printer how to process a print job. 派生自类的类都有一个和一个方法。Classes derived from the class each have a and a method. 您必须使用这些方法来确保类的实例与它们所表示的硬件或软件组件同步。You must use these methods to ensure that instances of the classes are synchronized with the hardware or software components that they represent. 命名空间还包含许多描述打印机功能的枚举，例如打印机是否可以生成逐份打印输出，并指定打印机的指令，如打印作业使用的纸张大小。The namespace also includes many enumerations that describe printer capabilities, such as whether a printer can produce collated output, and that specify instructions to printers, such as the paper size to use for a print job. 此命名空间是随 Windows Presentation Foundation 提供的增强型打印服务的一部分。This namespace is part of the enhanced printing services provided with Windows Presentation Foundation. 使用 Windows 窗体的托管代码开发人员必须使用命名空间中的 api。Managed code developers using Windows Forms must use the APIs in the namespace. > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类不支持在 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题，例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
